verbose_text: Thus, it might be reasonable to suggest that the bumetanide induced negative shift of the E gly and its recovery by furosemide reflects the involvement of NKCC1 and KCC2 in the determination of the E gly in heterozygous (+/cir) mice.
evidence: bumetanide-induced negative shift of the E gly  and its recovery by furosemide reflects the involvement of NKCC1
